home.why_us_subtitle: Expertise, Technology, and Quality in Metal Fabrication
home.feature_1_desc: Tolerances up to ±0.127mm in laser cutting and ±0.2mm in bending operations
home.feature_2_desc: Modern equipment including fiber laser cutting, CNC bending systems, and automated metal spinning
home.feature_3_desc: We work with stainless steel, aluminum, copper, and carbon steel
home.feature_4_desc: Quick delivery times while maintaining the highest quality standards
home.cta_description: Contact us today for a free consultation and quote for your project
home.title: MSADDI EST.

about.title: Über uns
about.subtitle: Führend in Metallverarbeitungslösungen
about.description: MSADDI EST. ist ein führendes Unternehmen, das sich auf professionelle Metallverarbeitungsdienstleistungen spezialisiert hat.
about.mission_description: To provide high-precision metal fabrication services using the latest technologies, while adhering to the highest quality and safety standards to meet our industrial clients' needs.
about.vision_description: To be the first and most trusted partner in metal fabrication in Syria and the region, through continuous innovation and excellence in performance.
about.cap_1_desc: Precise cutting up to 25mm thickness, sizes up to 1500×3000mm
about.cap_2_desc: CNC bending with angular precision ±0.5°, thicknesses from 0.5 to 12mm
about.cap_3_desc: Precise forming of cylindrical parts, thicknesses from 0.5 to 50mm
about.cap_4_desc: Comprehensive inspection of all products according to international standards

services.title: Our Specialized Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Sheet Metal Fabrication Solutions
services.service_1_desc: Precise laser cutting of various metals with tolerances up to ±0.127mm. We work with thicknesses up to 25mm and sizes up to 1500×3000mm.
services.service_1_features:
• High precision ±0.127mm
• Thicknesses up to 25mm
• Sizes up to 1500×3000mm
• All types of metals
services.service_2_desc: Bending and forming of sheet metal using modern CNC presses with angular precision ±0.5°. We handle thicknesses from 0.5 to 12mm.
services.service_2_features:
• Angular precision ±0.5°
• Thicknesses 0.5 - 12mm
• Complex shapes
• Large or small production
services.service_3_desc: Precise forming of cylindrical and conical parts using manual and CNC spinning techniques. Ideal for industrial and aerospace production.
services.service_3_features:
• Manual and CNC spinning
• Thicknesses 0.5 - 50mm
• Complex parts
• Various industrial applications
services.service_4_desc: We provide custom solutions for manufacturing metal parts according to your specifications and engineering drawings.
services.service_5_desc: Rapid development and production of prototypes to test designs before full production.
services.service_6_desc: High production capacity for large orders while maintaining quality and precision.
services.materials:
• Stainless Steel (304, 316, 321)
• Aluminum and alloys
• Carbon Steel
• Copper and Brass
• Titanium
• Nickel Alloys
services.cta_description: Get a free consultation and quote for your metal fabrication needs

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help with your industrial projects
contact.name: Name
contact.success: Your request has been sent successfully! We'll contact you soon

products.title: Sheet Metal Products
products.subtitle: Precision-Engineered Metal Components for Industrial Applications
products.cat_1_desc: Custom-designed electrical enclosures, control cabinets, and protective housings manufactured from stainless steel, aluminum, and galvanized steel. Precision laser-cut and CNC bent for exact tolerances.
products.cat_1_specs:
• Thickness: 0.5mm - 6mm
• IP Rating: IP54, IP65, IP66 available
• Surface: Powder coating, anodizing, zinc plating
• Max size: 1500×3000mm
products.cat_2_desc: Heavy-duty L-brackets, Z-brackets, mounting plates, and structural supports for industrial machinery, HVAC systems, and building construction. CNC bent with angular precision ±0.5°.
products.cat_2_materials: Carbon Steel Q235/Q345, Stainless Steel 304, Aluminum 6061
products.cat_2_specs:
• Thickness: 1mm - 12mm
• Bending accuracy: ±0.5°
• Load capacity: Up to 500kg
• Finishes: Zinc plating, powder coating, black oxide
products.cat_3_desc: Laser-cut decorative panels, perforated metal screens, facade cladding, and custom architectural metalwork. Available in various patterns and finishes for interior and exterior applications.
products.cat_3_specs:
• Thickness: 1mm - 4mm
• Perforation: Custom patterns available
• Finishes: Brushed, mirror, powder coated
• Weather resistant options
products.cat_4_desc: Precision metal parts manufactured to customer specifications including flanges, washers, spacers, shims, and specialized industrial components. CNC laser cutting with ±0.127mm tolerance.
products.cat_4_materials: Stainless Steel, Aluminum, Brass, Copper, Titanium
products.cat_4_specs:
• Tolerance: ±0.127mm (laser cutting)
• Thickness: 0.5mm - 25mm
• Quantity: Prototype to high-volume
• Quality: 100% inspection
products.standards_list:
• ISO 9001:2015 Quality Management System
• Material certifications and test reports
• Dimensional inspection reports
• Surface finish quality control
• Packaging according to customer requirements
products.cta_description: Get a free quote with technical drawings and specifications

capabilities.title: Manufacturing Capabilities
capabilities.subtitle: Advanced Equipment & Technical Expertise for Precision Metal Fabrication
capabilities.eq_1_specs:
• Laser Power: 3000W - 6000W fiber laser
• Cutting Bed: 1500mm × 3000mm work area
• Max Thickness: 25mm (mild steel), 15mm (stainless), 12mm (aluminum)
• Precision: ±0.127mm positional accuracy
• Speed: Up to 40m/min rapid traverse
capabilities.eq_2_specs:
• Bending Force: 125 tons hydraulic press brake
• Bending Length: 3000mm maximum
• Angular Accuracy: ±0.5° repeatability
• Thickness Range: 0.5mm - 12mm
• Back Gauge: CNC-controlled with multi-axis positioning
capabilities.eq_3_specs:
• Spinning Diameter: Up to 1200mm
• Thickness Capacity: 0.5mm - 50mm
• Chuck Speed: Variable 50-1500 RPM
• Types: Manual & CNC spinning available
• Applications: Cylindrical, conical, hemispherical parts
capabilities.eq_4_specs:
• CMM (Coordinate Measuring Machine) for dimensional inspection
• Digital calipers, micrometers (±0.01mm accuracy)
• Surface roughness tester
• Hardness testing equipment
• Material thickness gauges
capabilities.materials_table:
Stainless Steel 304/316|0.5mm - 25mm|Laser Cutting, Bending, Spinning
Aluminum 5052/6061|0.5mm - 12mm|Laser Cutting, Bending, Forming
Carbon Steel Q235/Q345|1mm - 25mm|Laser Cutting, Bending, Welding
Galvanized Steel|0.5mm - 6mm|Laser Cutting, Bending
Copper & Brass|0.5mm - 8mm|Laser Cutting, Spinning
Titanium Grade 2/5|0.5mm - 6mm|Laser Cutting, Forming
capabilities.capacity_stats:
Laser Cutting: 500+ parts
Bending Operations: 300+ pieces
Metal Spinning: 50+ units
Quality Inspections: 100%
capabilities.certifications_list:
• ISO 9001:2015 Quality Management System
• Material test certificates and traceability
• First Article Inspection (FAI) reports
• Statistical Process Control (SPC)
• Certified welding procedures (where applicable)
• Calibrated measurement equipment with certificates
capabilities.cta_description: Contact our technical team for capability assessment and quotation

rfq.title: Request for Quote
rfq.subtitle: Get a detailed quote for your metal fabrication project. Fill out the form below and our technical team will contact you within 24-48 hours.
rfq.name: Full Name
rfq.additional_requirements_placeholder: Please provide any additional specifications, drawings references, or special requirements...
rfq.file_upload_help: Upload CAD files, technical drawings, or specifications (PDF, DXF, DWG, STEP, STP, PNG, JPG - Max 10MB per file)
rfq.success: Your RFQ has been submitted successfully! Our team will contact you within 24-48 hours.
rfq.error: An error occurred while submitting your RFQ. Please try again or contact us directly at Sales@msaddi.com

offline.title: Sie sind offline
offline.description: Es scheint, als hätten Sie Ihre Internetverbindung verloren. Einige Funktionen sind möglicherweise nicht verfügbar, bis Sie wieder online sind.

suggestions.title: Was Sie tun können:
suggestions.tryAgain: Versuchen Sie, die Seite zu aktualisieren
suggestions.returnHome: Kehren Sie zur Startseite für zwischengespeicherte Inhalte zurück

offline.info: Diese Seite wird angezeigt, weil Ihr Gerät derzeit offline ist. Sobald Ihre Verbindung wiederhergestellt ist, können Sie normal auf alle Funktionen zugreifen.

pwa.install_description: Installieren Sie unsere App für schnelleren Zugriff, Offline-Unterstützung und ein besseres mobiles Erlebnis.
pwa.install_description_ios: Erhalten Sie schnellen Zugriff auf MSADDI mit unserer App. Installieren Sie sie auf Ihrem Startbildschirm für ein besseres Erlebnis.
pwa.ios_step_1: Tippen Sie auf die Schaltfläche Teilen in Safari
pwa.ios_step_2: Scrollen Sie nach unten und tippen Sie auf 'Zum Home-Bildschirm'
pwa.ios_step_3: Tippen Sie auf 'Hinzufügen', um zu bestätigen
